title: 游戏进入地狱奔溃
author: aaztm
txt_content:

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
删除[1.7.10]forgecreeperheal-1.0.0.jar
还有这个，
GL info: ~~ERROR~~ RuntimeException: No OpenGL context found in the current thread.
可能是显卡驱动要更新。（具体是什么我也不知道）

replies.author: yuudachi
replies.txt_content: 应该是内存溢出（算是瞎猜），请重新调整一下内存设定

replies.author: aaztm
replies.txt_content:

删除[1.7.10]forgecreeperheal-1.0.0.jar

谢谢，是mod的问题
